mcq.statement: Identify the sentence using the correct verb: The development group, along with the lead engineer, works on the project yesterday., The development group, along with the lead engineer, were working on the project yesterday., The development group, along with the lead engineer, was working on the project yesterday., The development group, along with the lead engineer, have worked on the project yesterday.

options.a: The development group, along with the lead engineer, works on the project yesterday.
options.b: The development group, along with the lead engineer, works on the project yesterday.
options.c: The development group, along with the lead engineer, was working on the project yesterday.
